properties.description: Pipeline to iterate over procedures created in SQL DB to load the edw layer dimensions from staging.

activities.name: Runtime Sequence Filter
activities.description: This is not filter anything out unless a specific sequence number has been input for a pipeline parameter at runtime.

activities.name: For Each Dimension
activities.description: Loop through all source tables that exist in JSON config file, under the pipeline name that equals current pipeline.

properties.description: Pipeline to iterate over procedures created in SQL DB to load the edw layer Fact tables. Load Dimensions should be execute prior to this pipeline.

activities.name: Runtime Sequence Filter
activities.description: This is not filter anything out unless a specific sequence number has been input for a pipeline parameter at runtime.

activities.name: For Each Fact
activities.description: Loop through all source tables that exist in JSON config file, under the pipeline name that equals current pipeline.

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/On-Premise PEWarehouse SQL Database to Azure SQL Database')]

properties.description: Source to staging pipeline that will reference config JSON file to loop through all tables that need to be staged. This will handle both incremental or full processing types.

activities.name: Runtime Sequence Filter
activities.description: This is not filter anything out unless a specific sequence number has been input for a pipeline parameter at runtime.

activities.name: For Each Source Table
activities.description: Loop through all source tables that exist in JSON config file, under the pipeline name that equals current pipeline.

preCopyScript.value:
@{concat('IF EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.tables t inner join sys.schemas s
				ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
                WHERE   s.name = ''',item().targetSchemaName
				,''''
				,' AND t.name = ''',item().targetTableName
				,''')'
				,' TRUNCATE TABLE ['
				,item().targetSchemaName
				,'].['
				,item().targetTableName
				,'] ELSE PRINT(''Table does not exist'')'
				)}

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/On-Premise SQL Database to Azure SQL Database')]

properties.description: Source to staging pipeline that will reference config JSON file to loop through all tables that need to be staged. This will handle both incremental or full processing types.

activities.name: Runtime Sequence Filter
activities.description: This is not filter anything out unless a specific sequence number has been input for a pipeline parameter at runtime.

activities.name: For Each Source Table
activities.description: Loop through all source tables that exist in JSON config file, under the pipeline name that equals current pipeline.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@if(equals(item().stagingLoadType, 'FULL'), concat('SELECT * FROM ['
,item().sourceSchemaName
,'].['
,item().sourceTableName
,'];')
,concat('SELECT * FROM ['
,item().sourceSchemaName
,'].['
,item().sourceTableName
,'] WHERE '
,item().modifiedDateColumn
,' > CAST('''
,activity('Lookup High Water Mark').output.firstRow.high_water_mark
,''' AS datetime2);')
)

preCopyScript.value:
@{concat('IF EXISTS ( SELECT  * FROM sys.tables t inner join sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id WHERE s.name = '''
,item().targetSchemaName
,''' AND t.name = '''
,item().targetTableName
,''') TRUNCATE TABLE ['
,item().targetSchemaName
,'].['
,item().targetTableName
,']')}

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Standard Orchestration')]

activities.name: On-Premise SQL Database to Azure SQL Database

pipeline.referenceName: On-Premise SQL Database to Azure SQL Database

dependsOn.activity: On-Premise SQL Database to Azure SQL Database

dependsOn: [concat(variables('factoryId'), '/pipelines/On-Premise SQL Database to Azure SQL Database')]

properties.description: Connection to Aprio Development SQL DB - Refer to secret stored in keyvault for connection details.
This inked service uses The self-hosted IR that is configured on Aprio_PE_SRV01
Nightly trigger to pause development AAS Instance
Linked to existing Integrated Runtime in ITAppsResourceGroup - AprioDataFactory with source server as Aprio-PE-SRV01 in GA Datacenter. Cbuss & SHillis FEB02-2021
